verses.t: The Revelation{G602} of Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, which{G3739} God{G3588} gave{G1325} unto him{G846}, to shew{G1166} unto{G3588} his{G846} servants{G1401} things which{G3739} must{G1163} shortly{G5034} come to pass{G1096}; and{G2532} he{G4591} sent and{G649} signified{G4591} it by{G1223} his{G846} angel{G3588} unto{G3588} his{G846} servant{G1401} John{G2491}:"en tachei" is "shortly". "he sent and signified": "sent" is participle so it means "senting" or "after sending" or "sent and also did something else". I tagged "and" with "sent".
Who{G3739} bare record{G3140} of the word{G3588} of God{G3588}, and{G2532} of the testimony{G3588} of Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, and{G5037} of all things that{G3745} he saw{G1492}.

Blessed{G3107} is he that readeth{G314}, and{G2532} they that hear{G191} the words{G3588} of this prophecy{G3588}, and{G2532} keep{G5083} those things which are written{G1125} therein{G846}: for{G1063} the time{G2540} is at hand{G1451}."en autee" is "therein".

John{G2491} to the{G1577} seven{G2033} churches{G1577} which are in{G1722} Asia{G3588}: Grace{G5485} be unto you{G5213}, and{G2532} peace{G1515}, from{G575} him which is{G5607}, and{G2532} which was{G2258}, and{G2532} which is to come{G2064}; and{G2532} from{G575} the{G4151} seven{G2033} Spirits{G4151} which{G3739} are{G2076} before{G1799} his{G846} throne{G3588};"tais en tee asia", "which are in asia". Difficult. "en" = "which are in" or something else?

And{G2532} from{G575} Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, who is the{G3588} faithful{G4103} witness{G3144}, and the first begotten{G4416} of{G1537} the dead{G3498}, and{G2532} the prince{G3588} of the kings{G3588} of the earth{G3588}. Unto him that loved{G25} us{G2248}, and{G2532} washed{G3068} us{G2248} from{G575} our{G2257} sins{G3588} in{G1722} his own{G846} blood{G3588},

And{G2532} hath made{G4160} us{G2248} kings{G935} and{G2532} priests{G2409} unto God{G3588} and{G2532} his{G846} Father{G3962}; to him{G846} be glory{G3588} and{G2532} dominion{G3588} for{G1519} ever{G3588} and ever{G3588}. Amen{G281}."aioonoon", "and ever"

Behold{G2400}, he cometh{G2064} with{G3326} clouds{G3588}; and{G2532} every{G3956} eye{G3788} shall see{G3700} him{G846}, and{G2532} they{G3748} also which{G3748} pierced{G1574} him{G846}: and{G2532} all{G3956} kindreds{G3588} of the earth{G3588} shall wail{G2875} because of{G1909} him{G846}. Even so{G3483}, Amen{G281}.

I{G1473} am{G1510} Alpha{G1} and{G2532} Omega{G5598}, the beginning{G746} and{G2532} the ending{G5056}, saith{G3004} the Lord{G3588}, which is{G5607}, and{G2532} which was{G2258}, and{G2532} which is to come{G2064}, the Almighty{G3588}.

I{G1473} John{G2491}, who also{G2532} am your{G5216} brother{G80}, and{G2532} companion{G4791} in{G1722} tribulation{G3588}, and{G2532} in{G1722} the kingdom{G3588} and{G2532} patience{G5281} of Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}, was{G1096} in{G1722} the isle{G3588}that is called{G2564} Patmos{G3963}, for{G1223} the word{G3588} of God{G3588}, and{G2532} for{G1223} the testimony{G3588} of Jesus{G2424} Christ{G5547}."who also am your brother": this is implied in "adelfos" or somewhere else but needs two splits! Or maybe "ho kai" is "who also am". See discussion on swor-devel mailing list.

I was{G1096} in{G1722} the Spirit{G4151} on{G1722} the{G2250} Lord's{G2960} day{G2250}, and{G2532} heard{G191} behind{G3694} me{G3450} a{G5456} great{G3173} voice{G5456}, as{G5613} of a trumpet{G4536},

Saying{G3004}, I{G1473} am{G1510} Alpha{G1} and{G2532} Omega{G5598}, the first{G4413} and{G2532} the last{G2078}: and{G2532}, What{G3739} thou seest{G991}, write{G1125} in{G1519} a book{G975}, and{G2532} send{G3992} it unto the{G1577} seven{G2033} churches{G1577} which are{G773} in{G1722} Asia{G773}; unto{G1519} Ephesus{G2181}, and{G2532} unto{G1519} Smyrna{G4667}, and{G2532} unto{G1519} Pergamos{G4010}, and{G2532} unto{G1519} Thyatira{G2363}, and{G2532} unto{G1519} Sardis{G4554}, and{G2532} unto{G1519} Philadelphia{G5359}, and{G2532} unto{G1519} Laodicea{G2993}.
And{G2532} I turned{G1994} to see{G991} the voice{G3588} that{G3748} spake{G2980} with{G3326} me{G1700}. And{G2532} being turned{G1994}, I saw{G1492} seven{G2033} golden candlesticks{G3087};

And{G2532} in{G1722} the midst{G3319} of the{G3087} seven{G2033} candlesticks{G3087} one like{G3664} unto the Son{G5207} of man{G444}, clothed{G1746} with a garment down to the foot{G4158}, and{G2532} girt{G4024} about{G4314} the paps{G3588} with a{G2223} golden{G5552} girdle{G2223}.

His{G846} head{G2776} and{G2532} his hairs{G3588} were white{G3022} like{G5616} wool{G2053}, as{G5613} white{G3022} as snow{G5510}; and{G2532} his{G846} eyes{G3588} were as{G5613} a flame{G5395} of fire{G4442};"de" is not translated.

And{G2532} his{G846} feet{G3588} like{G3664} unto fine brass{G5474}, as if{G5613} they burned{G4448} in{G1722} a furnace{G2575}; and{G2532} his{G846} voice{G3588} as{G5613} the sound{G5456} of{G5204} many{G4183} waters{G5204}.

And{G2532} he had{G2192} in{G1722} his{G846} right hand{G1188} seven{G2033} stars{G792}: and{G2532} out{G1537} of{G3588} his{G846} mouth{G4750} went{G1607} a{G4501} sharp{G3691} twoedged{G1366} sword{G4501}: and{G2532} his{G846} countenance{G3588} was as{G5613} the sun{G3588} shineth{G5316} in{G1722} his{G846} strength{G3588}.

And{G2532} when{G3753} I saw{G1492} him{G846}, I fell{G4098} at{G4314} his{G846} feet{G3588} as{G5613} dead{G3498}. And{G2532} he laid{G2007} his{G846} right{G1188} hand{G5495} upon{G1909} me{G1691}, saying{G3004} unto me{G3427}, Fear{G5399} not{G3361}; I{G1473} am{G1510} the first{G4413} and{G2532} the last{G2078}:

I am he that liveth{G2198}, and{G2532} was{G1096} dead{G3498}; and{G2532}, behold{G2400}, I am{G1510} alive{G2198} for{G1519}evermore{G3588}, Amen{G281}; and{G2532} have{G2192} the keys{G3588} of hell{G3588} and{G2532} of death{G3588}."aioonas toon aioonoon" is "evermore".
Write{G1125} the things which{G3739} thou hast seen{G1492}, and{G2532} the things which{G3739} are{G1526}, and{G2532} the things which{G3739} shall{G3195} be{G1096} hereafter{G3326};

The mystery{G3588} of the{G792} seven{G2033} stars{G792} which{G3739} thou sawest{G1492} in{G1909} my{G3450} right hand{G1188}, and{G2532} the{G3087} seven{G2033} golden{G5552} candlesticks{G3087}. The seven{G2033} stars{G792} are{G1526} the angels{G32} of the{G1577} seven{G2033} churches{G1577}: and{G2532} the{G3087} seven{G2033} candlesticks{G3087} which{G3739} thou sawest{G1492} are{G1526} the{G1577} seven{G2033} churches{G1577}.
